message.body: Hey you all probably know about Sam's Taylor passing away. I'm texting to see if any of you are going to the memorial service this Saturday?
Hey, can you call me whenever you can?

Hey, so I don't if you got my call from earlier but I'm going to take a shower now. You might be in bed by the time I get out but at least I have an idea of your schedule tomorrow. I guess I'll bring my laptop with me tomorrow and take it from there :)
Sorry. I passed out as soon as I got in. I'm free before 6 and after 11.
